column5: Private studio apartment in the heart of the City! Walk to Whole Foods, coffee, cafes, restaurants, bars, parks, Buffalo Bayou jogging trail, Waugh St. bat colony, shopping, & more. Minutes from Downtown, the Med Center, the Heights, River Oaks, the Galleria, West University, & more. Roku TV. Wifi. Full kitchen, full bath. Shared washer/dryer. 24 hr check in. (Street Parking Only)
